short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Digizuite Embedded UI to chrome and benefit from your single source of truth.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Digizuite Chrome Extension allows you to access all approved images and videos you need from any tab in chrome and on any website. Simply click on the asset (in the exact format needed) and get a direct URL which can be used in all from emails to marketing automation or CMS tools.
